span.span: The exception that is thrown when a call is made to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行呼叫以終結執行緒時，common language runtime 方法會擲回。When a call is made to the method to destroy a thread, the common language runtime throws a . 是特殊的例外狀況可以攔截，但是它會自動再次引發的結尾`catch`區塊。 is a special exception that can be caught, but it will automatically be raised again at the end of the `catch` block. 當產生這個例外狀況時，執行階段會執行所有`finally`區塊結束的執行緒之前。When this exception is raised, the runtime executes all the `finally` blocks before ending the thread. 因為執行緒可以進行無限制的計算`finally`區塊或呼叫取消中止，也不會保證曾經將會結束執行緒。Because the thread can do an unbounded computation in the `finally` blocks or call to cancel the abort, there is no guarantee that the thread will ever end. 如果您想要等到被中止的執行緒已結束，您可以呼叫方法。If you want to wait until the aborted thread has ended, you can call the method. 是封鎖呼叫執行緒實際上會停止執行之前不會傳回。 is a blocking call that does not return until the thread actually stops executing. > [!NOTE] > 當 common language runtime (CLR) 停止背景 threadsafter managed 可執行檔中的所有前景執行緒已都結束時，它不會使用。When the common language runtime (CLR) stops background threadsafter all foreground threads in a managed executable have ended, it does not use . 因此，您無法使用偵測時，clr 即將終止背景執行緒。Therefore, you cannot use to detect when background threads are being terminated by the CLR. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED，0x80131530 的值。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED, which has the value 0x80131530. > [!NOTE] > 繼承的值屬性一律會是`null`。The value of the inherited property is always `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範中止執行緒。The following example demonstrates aborting a thread. 接收執行緒`ThreadAbortException`使用方法來取消中止要求，並繼續執行。The thread that receives the `ThreadAbortException` uses the method to cancel the abort request and continue executing. [!code-cpp[ThreadAbEx#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ThreadAbEx/CPP/threadabex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ThreadAbEx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ThreadAbEx/CS/threadabex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ThreadAbEx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ThreadAbEx/VB/threadabex.vb#1)] 此程式碼會產生下列輸出：This code produces the following output: ``` Thread - working. Main - aborting my thread. Thread - caught ThreadAbortException - resetting. Exception message: Thread was being aborted. Thread - still alive and working. Thread - finished working. Main ending. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的物件透過指定`stateInfo`參數方法。The object returned by this property is specified through the `stateInfo` parameter of the method. 確切內容和此物件的使用方式是定義; 的應用程式它通常用來傳達正在中止的執行緒以有意義的資訊。The exact content and usage of this object is application defined; it is typically used to convey information that is meaningful to the thread being aborted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資訊傳遞給要中止的執行緒。The following code example shows how to pass information to a thread that is being aborted.
